snippet: A boutique hotelier has turned this former gay landmark the San Vicente Inn into a chic, affordable hotel — and he’s not done yet. For now, summer looks good on the 29-room property with its cleaned-up grounds.

headline.main: A Buzzy Hotel Oasis in West Hollywood
